Product Name: Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3 AMD Ryzen 5 Hexa Core 7535HS - (16 GB/512 GB SSD/Windows 11 Home/4 GB Graphics...
Review Details: First Impression: Great build no wobble, full fledged 70 watt RTX2050 gives nearly 3050 75w level performance. 16gb DDR5 ram. 7535HS is good. Only cons are: SSD maxes out at 3500/2000mb/s, though upgradation to a gen4 2280 SSD is possible. And no Ms office. Will update more with time

Review Details: Overall the product is really nice. Lenovo has included some tweaking features. The only problem that I felt is with the hinge. The laptop screen wobble sometimes.
